instructions: Go to My T-Mobile and log in to your account. Click your name at the top right > Profile . Click Privacy & Notifications > Marketing Communications . Click the following sliders to turn On or Off : Text or call my phone Send me email Receive monthly T-Mobile Newsletter Mail to my billing address To change your language preference, click the menu and then select a language.

Open the app and log in using your T-Mobile ID and password. Tap MORE > Profile settings . Tap Privacy & Notifications > Marketing Communications . Tap the following sliders to turn On or Off : Text or call my phone Send me email Receive monthly T-Mobile Newsletter Mail to my billing address To change your language preference, click the menu and then select a language.
